description:
Luffy`s red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je t’attendrai dans le Nouveau Monde ! Adieu aux valeureux pirates !
Shin Sekai de Matsu! Isamashiki Kaizoku to no Wakare
We`ll Be Waiting in the New World! Parting with the Courageous Pirates
Жди нас, новый мир! Прощание с Храбрыми Пиратами
سنكون في الانتظار في العالم الجديد! فراق قراصنة شجعان
新世界で待つ! 勇ましき海賊との別れ
